body:
I've tried to compile the examples with ```XCode 7 beta 5```, and I ran into the same problem.
It looks like that I can compile a project within XCode (the GUI) without signing it, but there is no way to use the CLI to do te same. Therefore ```gomobile``` does not work.
I've tried to reinstall the command line tools from the DMG "Command_Line_Tools_OS_X_10.10_for_Xcode_7_beta_5" without any more success.
My understanding is that I have to wait for iOS 9 to be installed on my iPhone to enable a "developper mode". I am right ?
